Articles.Content:
This is mah new probe!

VITOR 1 named after the PM of the KU Vitor Kerman the probe is used for looking at distant objects and other fancy-schmancy stuff
Please spell correctly, post craft files, show the launch vehicle, and capitalize.

Please spell correctly, post craft files, show the launch vehicle, and capitalize.

He did capitalize. VITOR 1 starts with caps, the next word doesn\'t need them. Also, he got his spelling rather well, and 'mah' was obviously intentional... If anything, I\'d ask him to re-read his second sentence as it doesn\'t make much sense.

Currently it is:

'VITOR 1 named after the PM of the KU VITOR KERMAN the probe is used for looking at distant objects and other fancy-schmancy stuff @

It should be:

'VITOR 1 is named after Ku Vitor Kerman. The probe is used for looking at distant objects and other fancy-schmancy stuff .'

Sorry, I\'m just annoyed by people who try to look clever by going into a thread, then giving no actual opinion of the craft, instead just accusing people of spelling wrong... :

About the probe, it looks rather cool. May we get some other camera angles?

I do note that you haven\'t reached orbital velocities with it yet, though! You might want to get a better launch vehicle for the thing! .

Yes I have redesinged the launch vehicle
